thread.title: Boyfriend pushes girl off ridge in shocking clip – then gives thumbs up
thread.title_full: Boyfriend pushes girl off ridge in shocking clip – then gives thumbs up

author: Joshua Barrie
title: Boyfriend pushes girl off ridge in shocking clip – then gives thumbs up
text:
Boyfriend pushes girl off ridge in shocking clip – then gives thumbs up We don't know whether the video is a stunt or not Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Hilarious video teaches you how to easily get rid of a girl Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A worrying clip has surfaced in which a man pushes a woman off a ridge before giving a thumbs up. 
We're not sure whether the seemingly cruel act is a stunt (we hope so). And it's got plenty of people on the internet asking questions. 
In the footage, which was posted to YouTube with the horrible title, "How to quickly get rid of a girl", we meet a young couple by the sea in France. Everything seems romantic to begin with. 
The pair are seen holding hands on the edge of a steep ridge gazing out to see and admiring the view. Everything seems fine The video is scary and we really hope it's a stunt (Photo: Jukin 125) 
The woman then turns and beams at her partner, who takes her hand to keep her steady on the edge of the hilltop. 
And then he pushes her off it. 
The woman can be heard letting out a scream before tumbling to the ground below. She lies motionless on the rocky grass, and the clip then cuts out. Shocking The girl is seen tumbling down the ridge (Photo: Jukin 125) 
We should reiterate that we're unsure whether the footage is staged – though many believe it was. If not, the video is serious, and quite sickening. 
"So mean but so funny," wrote on commenter on YouTube. 
Another said: "Straight f*
